# GRAPHICS::CASCADE_SHADOWS_SET_SCREEN_SIZE_CHECK_ENABLED

## Summary
Call this to enable or disable the screen size check used when visibility testing entities for cascaded shadows

## Parameters
* **BOOL** enable
